channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Chainalysis turned tracking crypto criminals into big business
item.description: Today, the company operates in more than 30 countries and has raised $536 million in funding.

item.title: One of Silicon Valley’s most prominent Democrats just said the party ‘really did alienate’ a huge chunk of the tech world
item.description: “I regret this and wish it didn’t happen,” LinkedIn cofounder Reid Hoffman said.

item.title: 20 jobs and careers AI is unlikely to ever touch, according to Microsoft
item.description: You'll want to avoid communications fields.

item.title: I’m a former governor, an education leader, and mother to recent college grads. Gen Z alarms me with their financial illiteracy
item.description: Gen Z is the least financially literate generation on record. I see it in the workforce and with my own kids graduating college.

item.title: TripAdvisor cofounder admits he’s often ghosted on LinkedIn now that he’s stepped down—but a career expert says it could be a ‘blessing in disguise’
item.description: Tripadvisor’s former CEO, Steve Kaufer, has been on the receiving end of radio silence for years. A career expert says there are four ways to make the...
